definition: trans,trans-Farnesyl diphosphate + n Isopentenyl diphosphate <=> Dehydrodolichol diphosphate + n Diphosphate

orthologs.K19177: dehydrodolichyl diphosphate syntase complex subunit NUS1 [EC:2.5.1.87]

name: (2E,6E)-farnesyl-diphosphate:isopentenyl-diphosphate cistransferase (adding 10-55 isopentenyl units)
